long_description: capakt focuses on redefining the automotive sector of bangladesh by pushing through the technical limits of the market while also appealing to the lovers of aesthetic design and unique cars and motorbikes. with a dedicated team of 23 members consisting of 2 dealers, 9 sales executives and 12 officials; capakt automotive strives to be your performance automotive destination, focusing on the latest vehicles and finest performance parts on the market. looking to quench your thirst for pampering yourself fashionably elegant and sophisticated products. look no further; capakt brings you a wide range of collection that oozes with the essence of pure class. our product line handpicked by our founder ahamed abreeq himself, grabs the fundamental nature of the sleek innovation of automotive designs, which expresses unique sense of personal style. being an asian fashion company, products: capakt's products specialize on accessories; ranging from stylish watches to bags that would definitely fit the taste of any youth out there.
generated_description: capakt studios, legally known as capakt corporation, based in dhaka, bangladesh, operates in three main sectors: automotive, wardrobe, and real estate. in the automotive sector, capakt focuses on enhancing the performance and aesthetic appeal of vehicles, offering a range of performance parts and accessories. the company employs a dedicated team of 23 members, including dealers and sales executives. in the wardrobe sector, capakt provides a variety of fashion accessories, including stylish watches and bags. lastly, in the real estate sector, capakt offers a range of properties, including apartments, condos, and villas, with a commitment to personalized service and competitive pricing.
generated_business_tags: performance automotive destination | stylish bags | hotels, apartments, and villas | fashionable watches | performance parts | unique cars and motorcycles | aesthetic design | real estate services | accessories and trinkets
